mods.abstract: (Top-left) Steve Leone, of Powhata, La., with the 177-pound gar he landed with a hand gig during the Natchitoches Gar Rodeo, and which won him the championship of that event."(Center-left) Crowd holding the 175-pound garfish which won the International Garfish Rodeo, staged by the Young Men's Business Club and the Rapides Parish Wild Life Association."(Circle-right) Earling Laborde of Marskville, winner of the International Garfish Rodeo, and Mrs, Margaret Rayner of Tioga, winner in the women's division of this event." Members of the International Garfish Rodeo committee barbecuing gar meat, which was served to the visitors at the rodeo exhibit at the conclusion of the fishing activities. More than 200 pounds of garfish were barbecued to feed the crowds.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
